Description.Text: Lindner Gallery Central is a modern 4-star hotel offering contemporary accommodation near the heart of Bratislava. It boasts an indoor swimming pool, a sky bar and a good location close to the historic old town. Ruzinov is one of the fastest-growing areas of Bratislava. Situated in District II within easy reach of the Old Town, the area offers a number of shopping centres and sports facilities such as the National Tennis Centre, the ice hockey stadium and the football stadium Tehelne pole. Nearby places of interest include the pedestrianised Old Town, the Slovak National Theatre, Saint Martin's Cathedral and Michael's Gate. Local tram services provide fast and easy access to other popular Bratislava destinations. The hotel is housed on top of the modern Central shopping centre. Facilities include an indoor swimming pool, a gym, sauna and steam room. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are decorated in a contemporary style. Amenities include a flat-screen TV, mini-bar, safe and work desk. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub with integrated shower. The hotel restaurant offers regional and seasonal specialities in an inviting ambience. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks and attractive city views at the Outlook Bar & Lounge. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.
